TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed ContextMenuService extends System.Object
public ref class ContextMenuService abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供系統實作以顯示 。

span.span: Provides the system implementation for displaying a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供可用來指定的外觀和內容功能表中的位置附加的屬性。The class provides attached properties that can be used to specify the appearance and position of a context menu. 許多屬性在類別也會由。Many of the properties in the class are also defined by the . 有時候會更方便使用設定的屬性屬性來設定類別比。Sometimes it is more convenient to set the properties by using the class than by setting the properties on a . 例如，您可以建立由多個項目共用，但使用類別，以指定不同位置每個項目。For example, you can create a to be shared by multiple elements, but use the class to specify a different position of the for each element. 下列屬性會由和類別。The following properties are defined by the and classes. 如果任一這些屬性上同時設定了和，屬性值，從用。If any of these properties are set on both and the , the property value from the is used. - - - - - - 您也可以使用以停用的項目上顯示的功能表。You can also use the to display menus on disabled items. ## Examples 下列範例會將指派相同給兩個按鈕和集合， ， ， ，和屬性可用來設定到每個按鈕的不同位置。The following example assigns the same to two buttons and sets the , , , , and properties to set the to different positions for each button. [!code-xaml[ContextMenuService_snip#SharedContextMenu](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContextMenuService_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#sharedcontextmenu)] 下列範例示範如何使用服務來顯示上已停用按鈕。The following example shows how to use the service to display a on a disabled button. 請注意，您將設定按鈕之父系的內容功能表上的屬性。Notice that you set the property on the button that is the parent of the context menu. [!code-xaml[ContextMenu#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContextMenu/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#3)]
